column1: #text='' Today I baked a pound cake for .
#text=I opened my cookbook to the page with the cake recipe .
#text=I looked at the list of ingredients for the cake , and put them on the counter .
#text=I followed the recipe which told me to preheat the oven to 400 degrees .
#text=I needed eggs , butter , vanilla , salt , baking soda , flour , and sugar .
#text=I took out a large bowl , a medium bowl , measuring cups , and measuring spoons .
#text=In the large bowl , I put a stick of butter .
#text=I measured a cup of sugar into the same bowl .
#text=I used my electric mixer to beat the butter and sugar until they were creamy and fluffy .
#text=Then I added eggs and a teaspoon of vanilla and mixed them in .
#text=In the medium bowl , I measured flour , along with some salt and baking soda .
#text=Next I poured the dry mixture into the wet mixture and stirred until everything was blended .
#text=I poured the cake batter into a loaf pan .
#text=Once the oven was preheated , I put the cake in .
#text=I put a toothpick in the center and took it out .
#text=The toothpick came out dry , so I took the cake out and put it on a rack to cool .
#text=Later I got to enjoy a slice of delicious pound cake , along with berries and cream .
